subject: Mr Dory Njaim and Mrs Cynthia Bardawil (RN Chemicals) : Request Travel Insurance
body:
Ref to above subject, please to issue 2 Travel insurance policies for Mr Dory Njaim and his wife Mrs Cynthia Bardawil, traveling outbound from Lebanon to Europe from 2025-06-05 to 2025-07-05 (31 days), under GOLD plan, Worldwide excluding USA & CANADA.

Premium for each is for 35$.

Above you find passports copies for your easy reference and guidance.

Regards
